# Content Wrapper



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description                                                                                                                                        | Type                               | Default         |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------- | --------------- |
| `backgroundColor` | `background-color` | Defines the background color.                                                                                                                      | `'default'` <br>\|` 'transparent'`       | `'transparent'` |
| `theme`           | `theme`            | Adapts the color when used on dark background.                                                                                                     | `'dark'` <br>\|` 'light'`                | `'light'`       |
| `width`           | `width`            | Defines the outer spacings between the content area and the left and right screen sides, as well as centering its content and setting a max-width. | `'basic'` <br>\|` 'extended'` <br>\|` 'fluid'` | `'basic'`       |
